ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]light Tharsis plate
ItemType.description: The standard armor used by Ares gunships is light, yet resistant to particle beam damage; it is, however, vulnerable to blast damage.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]Tharsis plate
ItemType.description: Tharsis plate is used by the Tundra heavy gunship; it is resistant to thermonuclear damage.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]massive Tharsis plate
ItemType.description: This is a double layer of Tharsis plate.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]dreadnought Tharsis plate
ItemType.description: The capital ships of the Ares Orthodoxy use this armor.

ItemType.name: titanium barricade
ItemType.description: These reinforced titanium plates are used in station construction both as bulkheads and as exterior armor.

ItemType.name: double titanium barricade
ItemType.description: These reinforced titanium plates are used in station construction both as bulkheads and as exterior armor.

ItemType.name: quad titanium barricade
ItemType.description: These reinforced titanium plates are used in station construction both as bulkheads and as exterior armor.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]neutronium armor
ItemType.description: Forged in the heart of a neutron star, neutronium is massive, nearly indestructible, and impossible to repair.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]dark matter armor
ItemType.description: Very little is known about this exotic form of dark-matter. It is impervious to most low-level forms of energy and yet light enough to protect a small ship.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]hierosteel armor
ItemType.description: Forged by the ancient Hierodules, this miraculous material can withstand all but the most brutal forms of energy.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]heavy plasteel armor
ItemType.description: This is a stronger plate of the popular plasteel armor.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]Dwarg chiton armor
ItemType.description: Dwarg raiders use a tough polyceramic armor that resists particle beams.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]Dwarg catoptric armor
ItemType.description: Dwarg engineers developed this particle-reflecting armor to defend themselves against Sung slavers.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]Dwarg holochroal armor
ItemType.description: This heavy armor is used by Dwarg behemoths. It reflects particle and ion damage.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]massive Iocrym armor
ItemType.description: This armor is used by the enormous command ships of the Iocrym fleet.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]light Iocrym armor
ItemType.description: The carbon aerogel armor of Iocrym ships is beyond human technology.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]Luminous armature
ItemType.description: The Luminous's drones are protected with this armor. It is a conductive exotic alloy that resists ion and thermo damage.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]depleted uranium armor
ItemType.description: Though dense and extremely strong, depleted uranium is difficult to repair.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]Dvalin armor
ItemType.description: Dvalin's nano-sintering process can create armor that is stronger than hexphase.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]light ceramic armor
ItemType.description: This is a lighter and weaker version of ceramic armor.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]light reactive armor
ItemType.description: This is a lighter and less powerful version of reactive armor.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]ultra-light titanium casing
ItemType.description: A thin titanium case protects ships that cannot afford too much armor mass.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]ultra-light titanium armor
ItemType.description: Ultra-light titanium armor is used on small and fast gunships.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]light titanium armor
ItemType.description: Titanium is one of the weakest materials used for ship armor. Nevertheless, for ships that require little protection or when cost or mass are a factor, light titanium armor is a good choice.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]ceramic armor
ItemType.description: This armor consists of heat-resistant ceramic plate backed by a fiber-reinforced composite. Ceramic armor is ideal for absorbing laser and particle beam damage.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]reactive armor
ItemType.description: Reactive armor is laced with miniature explosive cells that mitigate against the impact of kinetic weapons and chemical explosives.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]titanium armor
ItemType.description: Though not strong enough to be used in warships, this armor is more than twice as strong as light titanium armor. It is often used to protect freighters and scout ships.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]light XMH armor
ItemType.description: Originally designed by Solon Industries, XMH armor uses an experimental metallic hydrogen alloy. Most stations do not have the technology to repair XMH armor.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]heavy ceramic armor
ItemType.description: An improved version of ceramic armor, this armor is very effective against laser and particle damage.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]photo-organic armor
ItemType.description: This living armor consists of a carbon filament web fed by photosynthetic repair cells. Photo-organic armor repairs itself when exposed to sunlight.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]light plasteel armor
ItemType.description: This is a lighter and cheaper segment of plasteel than the standard armor.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]polymesh armor
ItemType.description: The incredible strength of the synthetic mesh resists kinetic and blast damage, but focused laser energy can burn through it.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]hardened reactive armor
ItemType.description: This is a radiation-immune version of the popular reactive armor plate.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]heavy reactive armor
ItemType.description: This heavier version of reactive armor can withstand more than 60 units of kinetic damage.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]plasteel armor
ItemType.description: Stronger than titanium yet almost as light, plasteel is a popular metal for use in all forms of space construction.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]polyceramic armor
ItemType.description: Polyceramic armor is one of the most advanced forms of ceramic armor.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]advanced reactive armor
ItemType.description: This is a more sophisticated version of reactive armor. Advanced reactive armor is very resistant to blast and kinetic damage.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]light solar armor
ItemType.description: One segment of light solar armor will provide 3 MWs of power when near a sun.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]light Tevlar armor
ItemType.description: This armor is composed of woven carbon fibers in a plasteel matrix. Though not as strong as plasteel, this material is far lighter.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]V10 powered armor
ItemType.description: Powered armor regenerates itself like an energy shield, though not nearly as quickly. The V10 consumes 0.5 MWs per segment.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]light blast plate
ItemType.description: Light blast plate is more effective against blast damage than advanced reactive armor.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]ceralloy armor
ItemType.description: This innovative ceramic-based alloy resists particle and ion damage.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]hardened plasteel armor
ItemType.description: This segment of plasteel armor has been specially modified to resist radiation.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]heavy plasteel armor
ItemType.description: This is a stronger plate of the popular plasteel armor.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]medium solar armor
ItemType.description: This armor combines honeycombed solar panels with a plasteel armor substrate. One segment of solar armor will provide 5 MWs of power when near a sun.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]blast plate
ItemType.description: This armor is made out of a plasteel alloy designed to resist missile damage.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]heavy ceralloy armor
ItemType.description: This is a heavier version of the innovative ceramic-based alloy.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]Duralloy armor
ItemType.description: A blend of plasteel and duranium infused with active nanomachines. Duralloy armor repairs itself slowly over time.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]light mark I Omsk armor
ItemType.attributes: commonwealth, makayev, minorItem, omskArmor, omskDS, specialty
ItemType.description: When installed on a ship with an Omsk deflector, this segment adds 20 hp strength to the shields.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]medium mark I Omsk armor
ItemType.attributes: commonwealth, makayev, minorItem, omskArmor, omskDS, specialty
ItemType.description: When installed on a ship with an Omsk deflector, this segment adds 25 hp strength to the shields.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]heavy mark I Omsk armor
ItemType.attributes: commonwealth, makayev, minorItem, omskArmor, omskDS, specialty
ItemType.description: When installed on a ship with an Omsk deflector, this segment adds 40 hp strength to the shields.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]advanced plasteel armor
ItemType.description: Advanced plasteel is stronger by weight than normal plasteel.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]heavy solar armor
ItemType.description: Heavy solar armor is suitable for combat, while still providing free power. One segment will provide 8 MWs of power when near a sun.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]stealth armor
ItemType.description: The special geometry and coatings of this armor provide a ship with a greatly reduced signature in most standard scanners.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]V70 powered armor
ItemType.description: Powered armor regenerates itself like an energy shield, though not nearly as quickly. The V70 consumes 1 MWs per segment.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]heavy blast plate
ItemType.description: This armor is made out of a plasteel alloy designed to resist missile damage.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]super-heavy blast plate
ItemType.description: This armor is made out of a plasteel alloy designed to resist missile damage.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]advanced ceralloy armor
ItemType.description: Though almost as effective as P150-grade Hexphase armor, advanced ceralloy is easier to obtain.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]light Gusoku armor
ItemType.description: Designed by the Bushido Corporation, Gusoku armor is light yet resistant to particle beam and blast damage.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]P150 Hexphase armor
ItemType.description: Hexphase armor is used extensively by ships of the Commonwealth Fleet. P150-grade armor can withstand 150 units of thermonuclear damage before collapsing.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]light orthosteel armor
ItemType.description: Orthosteel, a variant of plasteel, was used extensively by the Commonwealth Fleet until the creation of Hexphase armor.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]carbide carapace
ItemType.description: Carbide is a strong and light material akin to diamond. It is a difficult material to work with, however, and combining it with other armor segments often results in weak seams.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]light mark II Omsk armor
ItemType.attributes: commonwealth, makayev, military, minorItem, omskArmor, omskDS, specialty
ItemType.description: The embedded field projectors in this armor enhance the power of Omsk deflectors by 40 hp.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]medium mark II Omsk armor
ItemType.attributes: commonwealth, makayev, military, minorItem, omskArmor, omskDS, specialty
ItemType.description: The embedded field projectors in this armor enhance the power of Omsk deflectors by 50 hp.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]heavy mark II Omsk armor
ItemType.attributes: commonwealth, makayev, military, minorItem, omskArmor, omskDS, specialty
ItemType.description: The embedded field projectors in this armor enhance the power of Omsk deflectors by 80 hp.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]P450 Hexphase armor
ItemType.description: Hexphase armor is used extensively by capital ships of the Commonwealth Fleet. P450-grade armor can withstand 450 units of thermonuclear damage.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]light ithalium armor
ItemType.description: Ithalium is a rare ore found on volcanic worlds. Alloys of ithalium are particularly resistant to thermonuclear damage.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]medium ithalium armor
ItemType.description: Ithalium is a rare ore found on volcanic worlds. Alloys of ithalium are particularly resistant to thermonuclear damage.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]massive ithalium armor
ItemType.description: Ithalium is a rare ore found on volcanic worlds. Alloys of ithalium are particularly resistant to thermonuclear damage.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]orthosteel armor
ItemType.description: Orthosteel is a well-balanced armor, effective against both particle and blast damage.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]quadrocarbide armor
ItemType.description: Manufactured by the secretive Taikon corporation, quadrocarbide armor resists ion and positron damage.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]massive quadrocarbide armor
ItemType.description: Manufactured by the secretive Taikon corporation, quadrocarbide armor resists ion and positron damage.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]transuranic armor
ItemType.description: The strength of the material is almost unparalleled, but its properties fade as the elements decay into baser forms.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]V300 powered armor
ItemType.description: The V300 is a military version of Rasiermesser's powered armor. Each segment draws 2 MWs of power.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]hexacarbide armor
ItemType.description: Stronger by weight than P450-grade Hexphase, the secret of hexacarbide is known only to the Taikon corporation.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]massive hexacarbide armor
ItemType.description: This massive segment of hexacarbide is used to protect large ships.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]massive mark II Omsk armor
ItemType.attributes: commonwealth, makayev, military, minorItem, omskArmor, omskDS, specialty
ItemType.description: The heaviest armor in the Omsk series, originally designed for Makayev's canceled cruiser project, adds 100 hp to Omsk shields.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]P1000 Hexphase armor
ItemType.description: Hexphase armor is used by Commonwealth Star Carriers. P1000-grade armor can withstand 1000 units of thermonuclear damage before collapsing.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]advanced ithalium armor
ItemType.description: Ithalium armor absorbs more than 800 units of thermonuclear damage.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]heavy orthosteel armor
ItemType.description: Heavy orthosteel is almost immune to particle and blast damage. Against ion damage, it is better than P150-grade Hexphase.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]diamond lattice armor
ItemType.description: The nanofacture towers of the Assembler Corporation can produce a pure diamond lattice in any configuration.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]experimental ithalium armor
ItemType.description: This super-heavy armor is denser and more damage resistant than earlier ithalium armors.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]octocarbide armor
ItemType.description: The most advanced armor produced by the Taikon corporation, octocarbide can absorb almost 1500 units of ion damage before collapsing.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]massive octocarbide armor
ItemType.description: A double layer of octocarbide armor, suitable for large ships.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]Dragon armor
ItemType.description: This is a heavier version of the Sung's innovative armor, used on its Dragon slavers.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]super-heavy Sung armor
ItemType.description: This is a heavier version of the Sung's innovative armor, generally used on its Earth slavers.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]Sung armor
ItemType.description: This blast-resistant tiled armor can be cannibalized to repair other Sung armor segments.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]light Sung armor
ItemType.description: The Sung created this blast-resistant tiled armor for their Wind slavers. The tiles can be cannibalized to repair other Sung armor segments.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]light Urak armor
ItemType.description: The foundries of the Urak Warlords produce excellent armor, resistant to both laser and kinetic damage.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]super-heavy Urak armor
ItemType.description: The capital ships of the Urak Warlords use a heavy armor that resists laser, kinetic, particle, and blast damage.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]light meteorsteel
ItemType.description: A rare alloy invented by the Bennin Xenophobes, meteorsteel interferes with most shield generators.

ItemType.name: [segment(s) of ]heavy meteorsteel
ItemType.description: A rare alloy invented by the Bennin Xenophobes, meteorsteel interferes with most shield generators.

ItemType.name: worldship armor plate
ItemType.description: Like other meteorsteel armors, this plate interferes with shield generators.
